name: NOD: A Meditation on the Existential Pain of Becoming
name_original: NOD: A Meditation on the Existential Pain of Becoming
description:
Wander the defunct and irrational dungeon of the non-existent. With only a dingy map as your aid, traverse the incoherent landscape, sneak passed ghoulish prison guards and collect useless items to wear and/or to hold. Narrow is the path toward salvation, and few seem to find it. Don't get too hard on yourself if you give up out of frustration; one could say that is the norm.  

directional keys for movement

i for inventory

space bar for select

**This was originally an idea for Ludum Dare 47 game jam "Stuck in a Loop." My group ultimately went in a different direction, but I felt the desire to see this idea realized and took the month to cobble it together. As an artist, piecing together code and writing my own simple scripts was challenging, but somehow I managed to pull something somewhat interesting together. Thanks for taking the time to play.
